text: Asad Rauf (Punjabi, ; 12 May 1956 â€“ 14 September 2022) was a Pakistani cricket umpire and cricketer. He was a member of the ICC Elite Umpire Panel from 2006 to 2013. In 2013, he was found guilty of fixing cricket matches and corruption. In February 2016, he was banned for five years from cricket. Rauf died on 14 September 2022 from cardiac arrest in Lahore, aged 66.Former ICC umpire Asad Rauf passes away ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Pakistani cricketers Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest
title: Asad Rauf
